title: Group portrait of two men and two women standing, including groom, in center wearing moustache, dark necktie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, and bride, wearing floral headpiece, earrings, necklace, light colored belted wedding dress with floral lace overlay, and light colored cropped three quarter sleeve jacket with floral lace overlay and corsage on left shoulder, gathered in interior with patterned rug, floral wallpaper, and armchair draped in satin cloth
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
